first_para: Peter Pinkney is a British trade unionist and was elected president of the National Union of Rail, Maritime and Transport Workers (RMT) in December 2012. His mandate lasts into 2015. As leader, he has pledge the RMT "will fight for the abolition of capitalism and replace it with a socialist system". He was once in the Communist Party.

full.extract:
Peter Pinkney is a British trade unionist and was elected president of the National Union of Rail, Maritime and Transport Workers (RMT) in December 2012. His mandate lasts into 2015. As leader, he has pledge the RMT "will fight for the abolition of capitalism and replace it with a socialist system". He was once in the Communist Party.
In February 2015, he confirmed that he would be standing as a Green Party candidate in Redcar in the 2015 General Election.
full.title: Peter Pinkney
